metadata.description:
10-Page Preview!

Since Shinya was a child, he had known he was gay. Realizing how his sexuality was viewed, he had vowed to hide it his entire life. Then, a week after he had started dating his girlfriend, a man named Yuu told him he liked him.

"You've noticed your own sexual preference, right?"

Both relieved and shocked by Yuu's question, Shinya now stands at a crossroads, but will his choice bring him freedom or closure?

The long-awaited romantic-comedy debut of Katsuri Kojima, featuring older as well as younger lovers!
metadata.name: A Taste of Honey
